file_content.text: Who the... Republic soldiers?
Major! It's such a relief to see you--is the plan working? Is everything going alright?
The station's systems are in our control. I'm heading for the hostages now.
Affirmative.
That's fantastic!
No offense, but you don't look like heads of state.
Who are these people?
We're staff, not management. Some of us are pilots and ship crewmen; the rest are assistants and other "unimportant" people.
The mission would be going better if you weren't interrupting me.
You're slowing me down.
I'm sorry--I don't mean to be in your way, of course.
These people were traveling with the heads of state when they were captured, so the Imperials locked them in here. They're on our side.
Why didn't you tell us there was a rescue mission going on, Helik? We could pitch in! I'm ready to get some payback!
That doesn't seem wise. We would probably just get in the way. Let's leave this to the professionals.
Stay out of the cross fire. Hold here and keep your heads down.
You'd better stay here.
Yes, yes, whatever you think is best, Major!
Ugh. At least we won't be in here much longer. Good luck, pal--give those Imps what's coming to 'em!
Head for the maintenance section. My squad will keep you safe there.
Make a run for my ship.
Really? Thank you, Major!
I guess it beats staying locked up in here. Good luck, Major--we all owe you big time.
Anybody who wants to help, find yourself a weapon and start cleaning house!
Stand and fight!
You got it! Come on, let's go give those Imps a piece of our mind!
I, uh, I think I'll just hold down the fort here. Good luck, Major.
Hello? Are you there? Havoc Squad, is that you?
This is Havoc Squad. It's good to meet you, Helik.
Affirmative.
Yes. Yes, it's good to meet you too. Thank you for coming.
We're here, Helik. Feeling a bit nervous?
Stay calm, it's us.
Yes, yes, you could say that. I'm not exactly trained for situations like this.
Get your panicking done now. There's zero room for it on this op.
Pull yourself together!
Yes, of course, I'm sorry. I've just never done anything like this.
You've done this sort of thing before, right? Rescuing hostages? I really don't know anything about you.
Don't worry, sir. My squad and I are very experienced.
This will all work out fine.
Ah, good. That's good to hear, thank you.
You're not supposed to know any details about us; we're Special Forces.
We're top secret for a reason.
Oh, yes, yes of course. My apologies.
This isn't SpecForce amateur night, Helik. I know what I'm doing.
You're kidding, right?
Of course, of course. I'm sorry.
The people of Aquella truly appreciate what you're doing for us. I'm sure the citizens of all of the worlds affected by this situation do, too.
You're risking your life for leaders you've never met. Thank you.
The Republic is always proud to help its allies in need.
I'm honored to help.
The citizens of Aquella will never forget the help you're giving us.
I need those leaders alive because it makes the Republic safer.
This is for the Republic.
Even so, you're doing our citizens an incredible favor. We won't forget it.
I'm going to set course for Outpost 256 now. Good luck, Major.
We've got a job to do, and talking won't get it done.
Can we get going?
Yes, yes, of course. I'll set course for Outpost 256. Good luck.
